text: Tongkang LRT Station is an LRT station on the Sengkang LRT Line West Loop in Sengkang, Singapore. It was opened in January 2005. At the same time, the Punggol LRT East Loop opened. ==Name== The station's name refers to a light boat (tongkang) that was used for transportation on rivers. It was named Tongkang because the area it was located in used to be closely related with water activities. Also, there was a Malay village named Kampong Tongkang Pechah located southward, near to Gerald Drive & Jalan Kechubong. ==Sources== Category:Light Rail Transit (Singapore) stations Category:Sengkang
title: Tongkang LRT Station
